name: War of the Wells
description:
Submission for Other Worlds Game Jam at Media Molecule.

Wars of the Worlds is over, and the aliens were defeated by bacteria.....but they haven't given up! Now they have recruited a human to help them kill Wells and stop him writing the end of the book! But the rest of humanity don't want you to succeed in helping the aliens....

Co-op game with one player controlling the human, the other shooting any enemies. (And cars. They explode.)

Controllers preferred. Tested with PS3 and PS4 controllers.
